LanguageData.AvaliBasicBionicLeg.label: Basic bionic leg
LanguageData.AvaliBasicBionicLeg.description: A basic bionic leg. It isn't much better, but it's not too bad.
LanguageData.AvaliAdvancedBionicLeg.label: Advanced bionic leg
LanguageData.AvaliAdvancedBionicLeg.description: An advanced bionic leg, featuring better self repair systems, and a direct neural connection to the users brain, allowing it to do almost exactly what they want in a very precise manner.
